alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 12:49PM MST until December 02 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches, locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Blowing snow possible. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
